creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: small pouch bag with orange, yellow, brown and cream strap; alternating horizontal rows of brown, rust and cream ikat-like patterns flanked by stripes of predominately red and black rows with X motifs; trimmed in strands of black, yellow and white beads terminating in squares of animal hide with curly light-colored fur attached; coins at bottom
medium: Cotton, beads, animal hide and fur, coins
title: Bag
